creator: long@ku.edu
text:
When I run 'make install' on solaris 8 (using solaris cc and make) I get:

...
Making install in modules
Making install in aaa
mkdir /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules
/apps/users/long/src/httpd-2.2.0/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=install cp
mod_authn_file.la /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/
sed: command garbled: /^dlname=/{s/.*='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
sed: command garbled: /^library_names/{s/library_names='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
Warning!  dlname not found in /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/mod_authn_file.la.
Assuming installing a .so rather than a libtool archive.
/apps/users/long/src/httpd-2.2.0/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=install cp
mod_authn_dbm.la /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/
sed: command garbled: /^dlname=/{s/.*='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
sed: command garbled: /^library_names/{s/library_names='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
Warning!  dlname not found in /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/mod_authn_dbm.la.
Assuming installing a .so rather than a libtool archive.
/apps/users/long/src/httpd-2.2.0/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=install cp
mod_authn_anon.la /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/
sed: command garbled: /^dlname=/{s/.*='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
sed: command garbled: /^library_names/{s/library_names='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
Warning!  dlname not found in /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/mod_authn_anon.la.
Assuming installing a .so rather than a libtool archive.
/apps/users/long/src/httpd-2.2.0/srclib/apr/libtool --silent --mode=install cp
mod_authn_dbd.la /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/
sed: command garbled: /^dlname=/{s/.*='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
sed: command garbled: /^library_names/{s/library_names='\([^']*\)'/\1/;p}
Warning!  dlname not found in /usr/local/apache-2.2.0/modules/mod_authn_dbd.la.
Assuming installing a .so rather than a libtool archive.
...

It appears to be the sed command being used in build/instdso.sh causing the
problem as it changed between 2.0.55 (where it worked fine) and 2.2.0.

Here's the config.nice:
#! /bin/sh
#
# Created by configure

CFLAGS="-O"; export CFLAGS
"./configure" \
"--prefix=/usr/local/apache-2.2.0" \
"--enable-mods-shared=all" \
"--with-suexec-caller=httpd" \
"--with-suexec-uidmin=100" \
"--with-suexec-gidmin=1" \
"--enable-suexec" \
"--with-suexec-umask=077" \
"--enable-ssl" \
"--with-ssl=/usr/local/ssl" \
"--with-suexec-userdir=public_html" \
"--with-suexec-docroot=/apps/users" \
"$@"

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
Can you try the patch from bug 38108, to check whether this is the same problem:

http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/attachment.cgi?id=17816

creator: long@ku.edu
text: Yes, the patch you referred me to did the trick.  Thanks!
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 38108 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
